item.title: The Influence of Coach Greg Doucette: A Humble Realization in My Fitness Journey
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: Striking the Balance: Cardiovascular and Strength Training in My Fitness Journey ðŸ’ªðŸš´â€â™‚ï¸ In my pursuit of fitness, I’ve discovered a transformative realization that has become the cornerstone of my journey: the importance of striking the perfect balance between cardiovascular and strength training. A Focused Pursuit As a dedicated fitness enthusiast, I initially immersed myself in rigorous strength training, eager to see visible results. While this approach yielded satisfying outcomes, it inadvertently overshadowed the significance of cardiovascular exercises for overall well-being.

item.description: Today was a special day in my fitness journey â€“ I managed to bench press 90KG for 6 reps! ðŸ’ª I’m excited to share this milestone with you all, and let’s take a moment to celebrate together! ðŸŽ‰ A Journey of Ups and Downs ðŸ˜Š Over the past one and a half years, life threw some challenges my way â€“ with the pandemic and gym restrictions, it wasn’t easy to maintain my regular training.
